mapper.select:
select DISTINCT code_value k,CONCAT(code_value,' ',code_name) AS v from CM9010 where code_type='00235' AND effective_sts = '10'
AND ( lower(code_value) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) OR lower(code_name) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) )
order by code_value

select DISTINCT code_value k,CONCAT(code_value,' ',code_name) AS v from CM9010 where (code_type='00235' or code_type='00236') AND effective_sts = '10'
AND ( lower(code_value) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) OR lower(code_name) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{v,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) )
order by code_value
